11.title: Ikaros

113.content:
"Oh yeah! You know I like that baby! Ooh, give me some more!" the maid moaned, as her belly was caressed more.

"WHY THE HELL ARE YOU TWO WATCHING THIS"

The two Angeloids turned to a red-faced Tomoki Sakurai, seemingly mad at the celestial beings, as usual.

"There weren't any soaps on TV, so we decided to look through your videos" replied Nymph, a scrawny Beta Class Angeloid. "I'm not exactly impressed by this."

"WHAT HAVE I TOLD YOU MORONS BEFORE??? NO WATCHING ANY OF MY VIDEOS!!!" exclaimed the flustered teen.

Tomoki ran to his DVD player and quickly ejected the naughty disk as the maid was having her butt groped and slapped (Damnit this is the best part) and put it away.

"Alright, I've said it once, and I'll say it again: DON"T look at my magazines; DON'T watch my DVDs; and most importantly, DON'T interrupt me when I'M using them!!! DO YOU UNDERSTAND???"

"I guess" shrugged Nymph.

"Yes, Master" said the pink haired Alpha Class named Icaros. *My- my reactor; it's hurting again* thought Icaros. She began to blush deeply. *Am I malfunctio-*

"Hey, have either of you seen Astraea?" questioned Tomoki, "I kinda need to ask her something."

"Yeah, I think she went to Sugata's to get some food" replied Nymph, taking a bite of a potato chip.

"Hey, thanks Nymph." said Tomoki. "Icaros, watch the house for me, OK?"

"Of course, Master."

"Hey, what about me? I'm perfectly capable of house-sitting, too!" exclaimed Nymph.

"Knowing you, you'd probably start looking through my stuff again!" retorted Tomoki.

"Well fine. At least I'm not some pervy bug like you" Nymph said under her breath.

"Alright, see you two later."

"Goodbye Master." Icaros put her hand to her chest, her blush growing deeper.

Nymph noticed this. "Hey, Alpha! Is there something wrong?" she asked.

Icaros hesitated for a moment before responding. "No, nothing is wrong Nymph, but thank you for asking."

"Alright. well, I'm gonna go over to Sohara's place. See ya Alpha!"

"Goodbye Nymph." *Master doesn't seem to notice me* Icaros thought. *Maybe there is something about me that he does not find appealing.*

Her eyes were drawn to the recently removed adult DVD. There was a picture of a female on the front, but this female was fairly fat. Her breasts were even bigger than Astraea's, two giant pale mammaries, just waiting to be caressed. She had a colossal gut, rivaling the size of a watermelon. Her rear-end was enormous, two perfectly smooth balls of adipose, sitting atop perfectly smooth and fat thunder thighs. All in all, this woman was extremely overweight, bordering on obese.

Looking around her master's room, she discovered a theme with his material: They all were of overweight women.

*It appears that Master has a desire for women with a high amount of body fat tissue* Icaros thought. "That must be why he doesn't notice me" she said aloud, as she began to sob.

As if by fate, she noticed a page in her master's magazine. "How to fatten up your girlfriend" she read aloud, blushing when she noticed the word 'girlfriend'.

*KNOCK KNOCK*

"Someone *sob* is at the door" Ikaros said, as she got up. She opened the door and it was...
113.title: Overeating (to please Tomoki)

1131.content:
Ikaros opened the door to find the busty Delta Class Angeloid, Astraea.

"Hey Ikaros!" Astraea exclaimed "How are ya?"

Answering her own question, she noticed her pink haired friend had been crying. "Ikaros, are you doing alright?" she inquired.

"I'm fine Astraea, but thank you for asking" Ikaros said, still sobbing.

"C'mon now! I can't help you if I don't know what's wrong!"

"Really Astraea, it is nothing. I'm- *sob* I'm fine" she said tearfully.

"OK Icaros, I REALLY hate having to do this to ya, but if you don't tell me what's up, I'll have to smash your watermelon garden" she yelled, grabbing her sword.

This caught the Angeloid's attention. "You wouldn't dare." Ikaros said furiously, entering Uranus Queen Mode.

"Whoops, I, um, didn't mean THAT! I meant that, uh, I'd smash... TOMOKI! If you don't tell me what's wrong I'll smash Tomoki" the blonde said triumphantly.

This infuriated Ikaros even further. "Preparing to fire Artemis Missiles"

"OK! OK! Nevermind! No smashing! I won't do anything to your watermelons OR Tomoki!

Calming down, Ikaros exited Uranas Queen Mode.

"But Ikaros, please tell me why you were crying before."

Mentioning this caused Ikaros to start crying again. "Master *sob* doesn't find me attractive!" she cried.

"What? How do you know?" Astraea asked.

"He finds women with surplus adipose tissue attractive!" she sobbed.

Astraea paused for a second, thinking. "So, uh, what does that mean, exactly?

"He *sob* likes women who are fat" she said.

"FAT?? Tomoki likes fat chicks??" Astraea asked, startled.

"I believe so, yes. And I am *sob* not corpulent enough to please Master!"

"Tomoki... likes fat chicks?" She asked again.

*Ok think Astraea, you like Tomoki, Tomoki likes fat girls. OOH This is harder than 1+1. Think, think, think. THAT'S IT! Tomoki likes fat chicks, so I'll just gain weight! It's so simple even I could think of it! Astraea, you rule!*

Coming out of her thinking moment, she saw her good friend still crying about her dilemma with her master.

*Well, Tomo is HER master. Maybe I should help her gain some weight, too!*

"Hey, Ikaros! I've got an idea!

This surprised Ikaros. Astraea NEVER has ideas, unless they involve food. "What is your- *sob* your- idea?

"How about you eat alot of food and get fatter, then Tomoki will notice you!"

"Get... fatter?" The idea perplexed Ikaros. Angeloids don't gain weight, do they?

"And" Astraea added, "I can help you get fatter!"

"Help me... get fatter."

Will Ikaros...
1131.title: Astraea

14.content:

14.title: Hiroyi (angel)

142.title: One Month Later

1421.content:
"Ooh, that tasted amazing!" Hiyori said as she patted her plump belly, causing it to jiggle slightly. "I'm glad I got some of Ikaros's leftovers. She really is an amazing cook!"

As if on cue, the very familiar pinkette appeared around her green been plants, along with Nymph, Sohara and...

*TOMOKI!* she thought, *Oh no, if he sees my like this, he'll think I'm a big slob*

She dove to the ground behind her plants and-

RIIIIIIP

*Oh crap! My big butt ripped a hole in my overalls!* Deeply blushing, she did the best she could to cover the hole her supple booty had made.

"Hey, did you guys hear that?" asked a confused Tomoki.

"Yeah, it sounded like something ripping" replied Nymph, the short, skinny Beta Class Angeloid.

"Yes, Master" said Ikaros, the busty Alpha Class Angeloid and servant to Tomoki. "I believe it came from Hiyori's garden."

*OH CRAP OH CRAP OH CRAP What do I do? What do I do?*

"She's probably fine. Besides, we need to hurry up. It's measurement day today, and I CAN NOT miss that! Ikaros, have you got a card ready?"

"Of course, Master" the Angeloid replied, holding up one of the magical cards.

"Good! Then let's go!"

*Oh thank God they're gone, now I can get back to eati- wait, SCHOOL!* "I need to get ready for school!" Hiroyi exclaimed.

Darting into her room, she quickly removed her work clothes and began trying to put on her school uniform. Her first task was to get her bra on, which proved to be quite troublesome. Her fattened breasts were exploding out of the too small bra, giving her an enormous cleavage. And she couldn't even clasp it, but finally, after some struggling (and jiggling) she finally got it on, but was severely cutting into her back fat. *Ooh, that really hurts, but I'll be getting some new pairs after school. I just hope I don't fatten myself out of them TOO fast* She was able to get her shirt on, but kept on riding up, so she decided to just leave her fat, watermelon-sized belly out.

*Man, you cause me alot of trouble, don't you?* she thought, giving her love handle a squeeze and shaking it, causing it to jiggle for a good 10 seconds. Suddenly, she began blushing. *Why did that... feel so good?* she pondered. *Nevermind, gotta finish dressing* But her last article of too tight clothing was her skirt, which put up the biggest fight. Once she got it up to her plumped up thighs, it stopped. She couldn't pull her skirt over her inflated ass. Having even wider hips didn't help, either. *C'mon! Please fit!* she screamed in her head as her efforts to cover her enormous ass were just making it jiggle and wobble. But after a few moments of heaving, she was finally able to cover her fat rear end, despite it sticking out the bottom of her skirt. "My big butt is causing me even more trouble" she said, giving her derriere a good hard slap, causing it to wobble even more, and bringing back her blush, even deeper now. "Am I getting... arous-"

She was cut off by an alarm. Her clock read '7:50'.

"Oh no! I'm gonna be late for school!" she yelled as she ran out the door and on to the road, sprinting as fast as she could (which wan't very fast) her fat bouncing the whole way there.

By some kind of miracle (like the miracle of lazy writing :p) Hiyori made it to school in time, sweating and completely out of breath. Not surprisingly, she was getting more stares than usual, so she tried to cover herself as best as Angeloidly possible and sauntered to the school's doors. And when she made it inside, she found that she was next for measurement! (Lazy writing again. :p)

When she opened the door to the nurse's office, she saw the nurse was....
